structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Terms of officers when city assigned to another class.
